metadata.author: Development Team
metadata.description: Complete implementation of the Itqan multi-tenant educational platform with three educational sections and role-based dashboards

master.name: master
master.description: Main development branch with all platform features

master.title: Phase 1A: Quran Section Backend Implementation
master.description: Implement complete Quran section with models, controllers, and business logic for individual sessions and group circles
master.details: Create all Quran-specific models (QuranTeacher, QuranSubscription, QuranCircle, QuranSession, QuranProgress, QuranHomework) with proper relationships, validation, and business methods. Implement controllers for teacher management, circle enrollment, session scheduling, and progress tracking. Include Arabic localization and proper tenant isolation.
master.testStrategy: Unit tests for all models and controllers, feature tests for key workflows like teacher registration, circle enrollment, and session booking.

subtasks.title: Create Quran Section Models
subtasks.description: Implement QuranTeacher, QuranSubscription, QuranCircle, QuranSession, QuranProgress, QuranHomework models
subtasks.details: Build comprehensive models with proper relationships, casts, scopes, and business logic methods. Include Arabic localization and Quran-specific features like verse tracking.

subtasks.title: Create Quran Section Migrations
subtasks.description: Create database migrations for all Quran section tables with proper indexing
subtasks.details: Design efficient database structure with proper foreign keys, indexes for multi-tenant queries, and Arabic content support.

subtasks.title: Implement Quran Controllers
subtasks.description: Build QuranTeacherController, QuranCircleController, QuranSessionController, QuranProgressController
subtasks.details: Create full CRUD operations, booking systems, progress tracking, and session management with proper validation and error handling.

subtasks.title: Add Quran Section Routes
subtasks.description: Define routing structure for all Quran section endpoints
subtasks.details: Create RESTful routes with proper middleware, tenant-aware routing, and access control.

master.title: Phase 1B: Academic Education Section Backend Implementation
master.description: Implement complete Academic Education section with private sessions and interactive courses
master.details: Create all Academic-specific models for private tutoring sessions and interactive group courses. Include subject-based categorization, grade levels, and scheduling systems with Google Meet integration.
master.testStrategy: Comprehensive testing of academic workflows including teacher-student matching, session scheduling, and course enrollment.

subtasks.title: Create Academic Section Models
subtasks.description: Implement AcademicTeacher, AcademicSession, InteractiveCourse, AcademicSubscription, AcademicHomework, AcademicQuiz models
subtasks.details: Build models with subject expertise tracking, hourly pricing, course scheduling, and academic-specific features.

subtasks.title: Create Academic Section Migrations
subtasks.description: Create database migrations for all Academic section tables
subtasks.details: Design tables for academic sessions, courses, subscriptions with proper relationships and performance indexes.

subtasks.title: Implement Academic Controllers
subtasks.description: Build AcademicTeacherController, AcademicSessionController, InteractiveCourseController, AcademicSubscriptionController
subtasks.details: Create comprehensive controllers for academic workflows including session booking, course creation, and subscription management.

subtasks.title: Add Academic Section Routes
subtasks.description: Define routing structure for all Academic section endpoints
subtasks.details: Create tenant-aware routes for academic features with proper access control and validation.

master.title: Phase 1C: Cross-Cutting Features Implementation
master.description: Implement shared features across all educational sections: homework, quizzes, sessions, messaging
master.details: Build polymorphic models and systems that work across all three educational sections. Include homework submission system, quiz engine, session management, and enhanced messaging.
master.testStrategy: Integration tests to ensure cross-cutting features work correctly with all three educational sections.

subtasks.title: Implement Polymorphic Homework System
subtasks.description: Create homework models and controllers that work across Quran, Academic, and Recorded sections
subtasks.details: Build flexible homework system with file/text submissions, teacher grading interface, and progress tracking.

subtasks.title: Build Quiz Engine
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive quiz system with question builder, randomization, and grading
subtasks.details: Implement multiple-choice quiz system with timed attempts, automatic grading, and detailed analytics.

subtasks.title: Enhance Session Management
subtasks.description: Build unified session system with Google Meet integration and recording capabilities
subtasks.details: Create session scheduling, Meet link generation, attendance tracking, and recording management.

subtasks.title: Implement Enhanced Messaging System
subtasks.description: Integrate and enhance Chatify for role-based messaging with supervisor monitoring
subtasks.details: Build messaging system with 1-to-1 chats, group chats, supervisor mirror channels, and file sharing.

master.title: Phase 2A: Authentication System Implementation
master.description: Implement comprehensive authentication system for all user roles with tenant-aware access control
master.details: Build multi-role authentication using Laravel Sanctum, Spatie Permission, and Filament Shield. Include registration, email verification, password reset, and role-based redirects.
master.testStrategy: Security testing for authentication flows, role-based access control, and tenant isolation.

subtasks.title: Set up Laravel Sanctum
subtasks.description: Configure Sanctum for API authentication across all user roles
subtasks.details: Install and configure Sanctum with proper token management and API protection.

subtasks.title: Implement Spatie Permission System
subtasks.description: Set up role-based permissions with tenant isolation
subtasks.details: Configure roles and permissions for Super-Admin, Academy Admin, Teacher, Supervisor, Student, Parent with proper tenant scoping.

subtasks.title: Build Registration & Login System
subtasks.description: Create registration and login interfaces for all user roles
subtasks.details: Build role-specific registration forms, email verification, and login interfaces with proper validation.

subtasks.title: Implement Password Reset & 2FA
subtasks.description: Add password reset functionality and optional two-factor authentication
subtasks.details: Build secure password reset flow and optional 2FA using SMS/email verification.

master.title: Phase 2B: Multi-Panel Filament Dashboard Setup
master.description: Implement multi-panel Filament architecture with role-specific dashboards
master.details: Set up Filament 4 multi-panel architecture with separate panels for Super-Admin, Academy Admin, Teacher, and Supervisor roles. Configure proper navigation, access control, and tenant isolation.
master.testStrategy: UI testing for all dashboard panels, access control verification, and responsive design testing.

subtasks.title: Configure Filament Multi-Panel Architecture
subtasks.description: Set up separate Filament panels for each power user role
subtasks.details: Configure SuperAdminPanelProvider, AcademyPanelProvider, TeacherPanelProvider, SupervisorPanelProvider with proper routing.

subtasks.title: Build Super-Admin Panel
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive Super-Admin panel with global management capabilities
subtasks.details: Build dashboard with academy management, global user management, financial oversight, and system settings.

subtasks.title: Build Academy Admin Panel
subtasks.description: Create tenant-scoped Academy Admin panel with branding and settings
subtasks.details: Build academy-specific dashboard with user management, content management, and academy customization.

subtasks.title: Build Teacher Panel
subtasks.description: Create Teacher panel with schedule, sessions, and course management
subtasks.details: Build teacher-focused dashboard with calendar, session management, homework grading, and profile settings.

subtasks.title: Build Supervisor Panel
subtasks.description: Create Supervisor panel with monitoring and quality control features
subtasks.details: Build supervisor dashboard with chat monitoring, quality reports, and complaint management.

master.title: Phase 2C: Student & Parent Personal Areas
master.description: Build responsive Blade + Livewire interfaces for students and parents
master.details: Create mobile-first personal areas for students and parents using Blade templates and Livewire components. Include dashboards, subscription management, progress tracking, and communication features.
master.testStrategy: Mobile responsiveness testing, user experience testing, and accessibility compliance verification.

subtasks.title: Build Student Personal Area
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive student dashboard with all educational sections
subtasks.details: Build student interface with subscription management, homework submission, quiz taking, progress reports, and messaging.

subtasks.title: Build Parent Personal Area
subtasks.description: Create parent dashboard with child monitoring and payment management
subtasks.details: Build parent interface with child progress monitoring, payment management, teacher communication, and multiple children support.

subtasks.title: Implement Mobile Responsiveness
subtasks.description: Ensure all personal areas are fully responsive and mobile-optimized
subtasks.details: Optimize layouts for mobile devices, implement touch-friendly interfaces, and ensure accessibility compliance.

master.title: Phase 3A: Recorded Courses Frontend Implementation
master.description: Complete the frontend implementation for the Recorded Courses section
master.details: Build course catalog, video player interface, enrollment system, and progress tracking frontend for the already-implemented Recorded Courses backend.
master.testStrategy: Video playback testing, progress tracking accuracy, payment flow testing, and certificate generation verification.

subtasks.title: Build Course Catalog Interface
subtasks.description: Create course browsing and discovery interface with filtering and search
subtasks.details: Build responsive course catalog with advanced filtering, search functionality, and course preview capabilities.

subtasks.title: Implement Video Player
subtasks.description: Create advanced video player with progress tracking and interactive features
subtasks.details: Build video player with progress saving, bookmarks, notes, speed control, and transcript support.

subtasks.title: Build Course Enrollment System
subtasks.description: Create course enrollment and payment processing interface
subtasks.details: Build enrollment flow with payment integration, enrollment confirmation, and access management.

subtasks.title: Implement Progress Analytics
subtasks.description: Build student progress dashboard and certificate generation interface
subtasks.details: Create detailed progress analytics, completion certificates, and achievement tracking interface.

master.title: Phase 3B: Payment Gateway Integration
master.description: Integrate Paymob and Tap payment gateways with comprehensive billing system
master.details: Complete payment processing implementation with multiple gateway support, invoice generation, subscription billing, and refund processing.
master.testStrategy: End-to-end payment testing, refund processing verification, and subscription billing accuracy testing.

subtasks.title: Integrate Paymob Gateway
subtasks.description: Implement Paymob payment gateway for MENA region
subtasks.details: Configure Paymob API integration with webhook handling, payment verification, and error management.

subtasks.title: Integrate Tap Payments Gateway
subtasks.description: Implement Tap Payments gateway for GCC region
subtasks.details: Configure Tap Payments API with multi-currency support, payment verification, and regional compliance.

subtasks.title: Build Invoice & Receipt System
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive invoicing and receipt generation system
subtasks.details: Build PDF invoice generation, receipt management, and transaction history tracking.

subtasks.title: Implement Subscription Billing
subtasks.description: Build automated subscription billing and renewal system
subtasks.details: Create subscription management, renewal notifications, and automated billing cycles.

master.title: Phase 3C: Real-Time Features Integration
master.description: Implement real-time features including WebSocket communication, notifications, and live updates
master.details: Integrate WebSocket communication, push notifications, real-time chat, session reminders, and live dashboard updates.
master.testStrategy: Real-time functionality testing, notification delivery verification, and WebSocket connection stability testing.

subtasks.title: Configure WebSocket Infrastructure
subtasks.description: Set up Soketi/Pusher for real-time communication
subtasks.details: Configure WebSocket server, authentication, and channel management for real-time features.

subtasks.title: Implement Push Notifications
subtasks.description: Build FCM push notification system for mobile and web
subtasks.details: Configure FCM integration with notification scheduling, delivery tracking, and user preferences.

subtasks.title: Build Real-Time Chat System
subtasks.description: Enhance messaging system with real-time capabilities
subtasks.details: Implement real-time messaging with typing indicators, online status, and message delivery confirmation.

subtasks.title: Implement Session Reminders
subtasks.description: Build automated session reminder and notification system
subtasks.details: Create automated reminders 15 minutes before sessions with Google Meet link delivery.

master.title: Phase 4A: Google Meet Integration
master.description: Implement comprehensive Google Meet integration with calendar API and recording management
master.details: Build Google Calendar API integration for automatic Meet link generation, session scheduling, and recording management for different session types.
master.testStrategy: Google API integration testing, Meet link generation verification, and recording functionality testing.

subtasks.title: Configure Google Calendar API
subtasks.description: Set up Google Calendar API integration for Meet link generation
subtasks.details: Configure Google API credentials, calendar access, and Meet link creation automation.

subtasks.title: Implement Automatic Meet Link Generation
subtasks.description: Build system to automatically generate Meet links 15 minutes before sessions
subtasks.details: Create scheduled job to generate Meet links and send to participants with proper timing.

subtasks.title: Build Recording Management
subtasks.description: Implement session recording management for Interactive Courses
subtasks.details: Build recording storage, access control, and playback system for course recordings.

master.title: Phase 4B: Testing & Quality Assurance
master.description: Implement comprehensive testing suite and quality assurance processes
master.details: Build complete testing infrastructure including unit tests, feature tests, integration tests, and browser tests. Implement quality assurance processes and performance optimization.
master.testStrategy: Automated testing pipeline with coverage reporting, performance benchmarking, and security testing.

subtasks.title: Build Unit Test Suite
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for all models and controllers
subtasks.details: Write unit tests with high coverage for all business logic, model relationships, and controller methods.

subtasks.title: Implement Feature Tests
subtasks.description: Create feature tests for all user workflows and critical paths
subtasks.details: Build comprehensive feature tests covering registration, enrollment, payment, and session workflows.

subtasks.title: Add Integration Tests
subtasks.description: Create integration tests for payment processing and external API integrations
subtasks.details: Test payment gateway integrations, Google API interactions, and notification delivery systems.

subtasks.title: Implement Browser Tests
subtasks.description: Create browser automation tests for critical user journeys
subtasks.details: Build end-to-end browser tests using Laravel Dusk for complete user workflows.

master.title: Phase 4C: Performance Optimization
master.description: Optimize application performance, implement caching strategies, and ensure scalability
master.details: Implement comprehensive performance optimization including database query optimization, caching strategies, file delivery optimization, and scalability improvements.
master.testStrategy: Performance benchmarking, load testing, and scalability testing under various conditions.

subtasks.title: Optimize Database Queries
subtasks.description: Implement query optimization and efficient indexing strategies
subtasks.details: Optimize slow queries, implement proper indexes, and add query caching where appropriate.

subtasks.title: Implement Caching Strategy
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive caching system using Redis
subtasks.details: Implement multi-level caching for user data, permissions, settings, and frequently accessed content.

subtasks.title: Optimize File Delivery
subtasks.description: Implement CDN integration and file optimization
subtasks.details: Configure CDN for static assets, optimize video delivery, and implement efficient file storage strategies.

subtasks.title: Implement Queue Optimization
subtasks.description: Optimize background job processing and queue management
subtasks.details: Configure queue priorities, optimize job processing, and implement efficient background task handling.

master.title: Phase 5A: Security Implementation
master.description: Implement comprehensive security measures and conduct security audit
master.details: Implement security best practices, conduct vulnerability assessment, and ensure data protection compliance. Include input validation, CSRF protection, XSS prevention, and secure file handling.
master.testStrategy: Security penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, and compliance verification.

subtasks.title: Implement Input Validation
subtasks.description: Add comprehensive input validation and sanitization across all forms
subtasks.details: Implement server-side validation, input sanitization, and protection against injection attacks.

subtasks.title: Add Security Headers
subtasks.description: Implement security headers and CSRF protection
subtasks.details: Configure security headers, CSRF tokens, and XSS protection mechanisms.

subtasks.title: Secure File Uploads
subtasks.description: Implement secure file upload and storage system
subtasks.details: Add file type validation, virus scanning, and secure storage with signed URLs.

subtasks.title: Conduct Security Audit
subtasks.description: Perform comprehensive security audit and penetration testing
subtasks.details: Conduct thorough security review, vulnerability assessment, and compliance verification.

master.title: Phase 5B: Documentation & Training
master.description: Create comprehensive documentation and training materials for all user roles
master.details: Build complete documentation including API documentation, user guides, admin manuals, and developer documentation. Create training materials and video tutorials.
master.testStrategy: Documentation accuracy verification, user testing of guides, and training material effectiveness assessment.

subtasks.title: Create API Documentation
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive API documentation with examples
subtasks.details: Document all API endpoints with request/response examples, authentication, and error handling.

subtasks.title: Write User Guides
subtasks.description: Create user guides for all user roles and features
subtasks.details: Build step-by-step guides for students, teachers, admins, and parents with screenshots and examples.

subtasks.title: Build Admin Manual
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive admin documentation for system management
subtasks.details: Document admin features, system configuration, troubleshooting, and maintenance procedures.

subtasks.title: Create Training Videos
subtasks.description: Produce training videos and tutorials for all user types
subtasks.details: Create video tutorials covering key workflows, feature demonstrations, and troubleshooting guides.

master.title: Phase 5C: Deployment & DevOps
master.description: Set up production deployment pipeline and monitoring infrastructure
master.details: Configure production environment, implement CI/CD pipeline, set up monitoring and logging, and establish backup and disaster recovery procedures.
master.testStrategy: Deployment testing, monitoring verification, backup restoration testing, and disaster recovery simulation.

subtasks.title: Configure Production Environment
subtasks.description: Set up production servers, databases, and infrastructure
subtasks.details: Configure production servers, database clusters, Redis cache, and file storage with proper security.

subtasks.title: Implement CI/CD Pipeline
subtasks.description: Build automated deployment pipeline with testing and quality gates
subtasks.details: Configure GitHub Actions for automated testing, building, and zero-downtime deployment.

subtasks.title: Set up Monitoring
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive application and infrastructure monitoring
subtasks.details: Configure application monitoring, error tracking, performance metrics, and alerting systems.

subtasks.title: Establish Backup Procedures
subtasks.description: Implement backup and disaster recovery procedures
subtasks.details: Configure automated backups, disaster recovery procedures, and data restoration protocols.
